long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SeaMeet AI Meeting Copilot: Your 24/7 Companion for Real-Time Meeting Transcription, Summaries, and More

Seamless integration for Google Meet (online and hybrid meetings), support for uploaded audio, and features designed for cross-timezone collaboration, SeaMeet keeps you and your team in sync.

Key Use Cases:
1ï¸âƒ£ Late or Double-Booked? Get instant access to missed discussions with real-time summaries, enabling you to catch up and join seamlessly.

2ï¸âƒ£ Back-to-Back Meetings: Stay on top of each meeting's key points with immediate transcripts and summaries that keep you informed and in control.

3ï¸âƒ£ Multiple Concurrent Meetings: Effortlessly manage overlapping sessions with SeaMeetâ€™s real-time speech-to-text and summary capabilities.

4ï¸âƒ£ Audience Mode: Need to stay informed but donâ€™t need to speak? Use Audience Mode to stay updated without active participation.

5ï¸âƒ£ Cross-Timezone Teams: Ensure all global team members stay aligned with shared summaries, available anytime, anywhere.

Key Features:
1. Real-Time Transcription ğŸ™
Highly accurate transcriptions for Google Meet.
Focus fully on discussions while SeaMeet captures every detail.

2. Intelligent Summaries and Action Items ğŸ¤–
AI-generated summaries with actionable items and topics, saving tons of time every meeting.

3. Centralized Meeting Notes Repository ğŸ—‚
Organize all meeting notes in one place. Search, review, and quickly find past discussions.

4. Seamless Sharing and Exporting ğŸ”„
Instantly share meeting notes via email or Google Docs. Searchable, sharable, and trackable.

5. Integrated Notepad and Highlights ğŸ“
Jot down agendas, notes, or action items directly during meetings. Timestamp crucial moments for easy reference.

6. Advanced Recording and Playback ğŸ“¹
Record high-quality audio for playback of the full or specific parts of conversations.

7. Multilingual Transcriptions ğŸŒ
Transcribes multiple languages, making meetings accessible across different dialects and languages.


ğŸ¤ Customer Success Story:
See how SeaMeet empowered a global team with members in Taiwan and Silicon Valley to boost productivity, saving 65 minutes per person weekly. With SeaMeet, they bridged timezone gaps, fostered intercultural communication, and gained insights into cross-border team dynamics.
>>> Read the entire report: https://usecase.seasalt.ai/seameet-global-team-case-study

ğŸ’µ Plans and Pricing:
- Free Plan: 6 transcription hours (lifetime), 1 concurrent meeting, 5-hour meeting recording
- Individual ($9.99/month): 20 transcription hours, 100 audio uploads, export options
- Team ($14.99/month per user): 30 hours per user, 3 concurrent meetings, 200 uploads
- Enterprise: Custom options for advanced needs, including single sign-on, tailored meeting quotas, and dedicated technical support.

ğŸ”’ Data Privacy and Security
SeaMeet prioritizes your privacy, adhering to strict international standards for a secure meeting environment.
Support: seameet@seasalt.ai

Follow Us:
 - SeaMeet by Seasalt.ai: https://meet.seasalt.ai/
